title: Recruiting for a competetive Team

embed.title: Join the Auvyen Discord Server!
embed.description: Check out the Auvyen community on Discord - hang out with 4 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Hello and welcome :) 
I set up a Tryout to build a new Comp Team. 
We are looking for 3 people per position. 
You're gold, you want to play competitive and arenÂ´t be afraid of trainings? 
Write me a message for more information. 

The try out will take place on Sunday the 16.06.2019 from 2 pm to 6 pm CEST

Looking forward to hear from you eighter ingame or at discord ( Check link shown to my server )

 {{sticker:poppy-wink}}
